lines.text: I always thought I'd regret the things I've done. Instead, I regret the things I didn't do.
The pain is bad enough. Don't go poetic on me.
There's been entirely too much externalizing of emotion lately.
You still believe in free will? In here there's no such thing.
Yes, but they don't control me.
So how's life in the suburbs?
Oh yeah, we all remember normal.
He won't put up much of a fight, most of these scientists are pretty lame. I'm an exception.
Fear of failure is the only thing that keeps us alive in this place.
Don't worry Birkoff. You're still my favorite overachiever.
